summary: A boy is left alone in a Jewish neighborhood in the year of 1970, where both world cup and dictatorship happen in Brazil.
cast: Michel Joelsas|Germano Haiut|Paulo Autran|Simone Spoladore|Eduardo Moreira|Caio Blat|Daniela Piepszyk|Liliana De Castro|Rodrigo dos Santos|Felipe Hanna Braun|Gabriel Eric Bursztein|Abrahão Farc|Haim Fridman|Edu Guimarães|Gérson|Jairzinho|David Kullock|Sérgio Mastropasqua|Pelé|Rivelino|João Saldanha|Hugueta Sendacz|Tostao
keywords: boy wears eyeglasses|brazilian military dictatorship|boy|jewish|world cup
title: El año que mis padres se fueron de vacaciones
